pullrequest.title: Fix use of FindZIP without pkg-config

content.raw:
As documented in  [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/deed8342bc76cbc630420538263ceb07ca6d5ad5/cmake/IgnPkgConfig.cmake#lines-20](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/deed8342bc76cbc630420538263ceb07ca6d5ad5/cmake/IgnPkgConfig.cmake#lines-20),   
the  `ign_pkg_check_modules` function is meant to be used  only “if pkg-config is the only means by which you will be searching for the package”.   
As in this case we also use standard CMake means if the search with pkg-config  fails, it is  more appropriate to use `ign_pkg_check_modules_quiet` , and   
unify the call to `find_package_handle_standard_args` \(previously included inside `ign_pkg_check_modules`\) between the two ways of finding the package. 

This fixes any use as `find_package(ZIP REQUIRED)` if pkg-config is not installed in the system. 

‌
